text: “Hiwa chongminkhi inkhat hi rangaingru,” Jisu'n ati. “Leimapupa inkhat in theibombil inkhat athoa aleiling, halli aleirakulla, theibomtui sumnasik khur inkhat aleichei, hiwa ngaaknasik ah berteii khat aleisak. Khawa suoli chuonkatho ngaidiang aminhuumma ramkalaak inkhattiang aleisijei. Isa 5:1,2
